meanings.definition: A large African antelope with long, straight horns.
meanings.sent1: The gemsbuck grazed peacefully in the savanna.
meanings.sent2: I saw a gemsbuck at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: Why did the gemsbuck bring a suitcase to the party? To show off its horns!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the gemsbuck's horns.
meanings.sent5: The gemsbuck's horns gleamed in the sunlight, a majestic sight.

meanings.definition: The flesh of the gemsbuck, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The gemsbuck meat was tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a delicious gemsbuck stew.
meanings.sent3: Why did the gemsbuck refuse to share its meat? Because it was a little 'self-ish'!
meanings.sent4: The gemsbuck meat melted in my mouth like butter.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cooking gemsbuck filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: The skin of the gemsbuck, used for leather.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman made a beautiful bag from gemsbuck leather.
meanings.sent2: The gemsbuck hide was soft yet durable.
meanings.sent3: Why did the gemsbuck skin go to school? To become a 'tanned' student!
meanings.sent4: Her boots were as tough as gemsbuck leather.
meanings.sent5: The gemsbuck leather jacket was a prized possession, admired by all.
